arrow.description: Whether the arrows in the drop-down box are displayed

autoAdjustOverflow.description: Automatically adjusts the position of the drop-down box when it is occluded
autoAdjustOverflow.description_zh: 下拉框被遮挡时自动调整位置

autoFocus.description: Turn on the autofocus drop-down box
autoFocus.description_zh: 打开后自动聚焦下拉框

disabled.description: menu whether or not to disable

destroyPopupOnHide.description: Whether to destroy the dropdown after it is closed

getPopupContainer.description: The menu renders the parent node. By default, it is rendered to the body, and if you're having trouble scrolling the menu, try modifying the scrolling area and positioning it relative to it. [Example] (https://codepen.io/afc163/pen/zEjNOy?editors=0010)
getPopupContainer.description_zh: 菜单渲染父节点。默认渲染到 body 上，如果你遇到菜单滚动定位问题，试试修改为滚动的区域，并相对其定位。[示例](https://codepen.io/afc163/pen/zEjNOy?editors=0010)

overlayClassName.description: Drop-down the class name of the root element

overlayStyle.description: Drop-down the style of the root element

placement.description_zh: 菜单弹出位置：`bottom` `bottomLeft` `bottomRight` top `topLeft` topRight

trigger.description: Triggers the behavior of pulling down, and the mobile terminal does not support hover
trigger.description_zh: 触发下拉的行为, 移动端不支持 hover

open.description: Whether the menu is displayed or not, less than 4.23.0 uses visible
open.description_zh: 菜单是否显示，小于 4.23.0 使用 visible

events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: It is called when the menu display status changes, and the disappear caused by clicking the menu button will not be triggered. Less than 4.23.0 uses onVisibleChange
events.description_zh: 菜单显示状态改变时调用，点击菜单按钮导致的消失不会触发。小于 4.23.0 使用 onVisibleChange
